metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15589 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An improper access control vulnerability exists in Gitlab <v12.3.2,<v12.2.6, <v12.1.12 which would allow a blocked user would be able to useGIT clone and pull if he had obtained a CI/CD token before.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
